great_northern_war_1700.headline: Great Northern War begins
great_northern_war_1700.description: Major conflict between Russian and Swedish Empires affecting Northern European politics and trade
great_northern_war_1700.impact_on_science: Disrupts academic exchange between Nordic countries and affects funding for scientific institutions

kingdom_prussia_1701.headline: Kingdom of Prussia declared
kingdom_prussia_1701.description: Frederick I establishes Kingdom of Prussia, creating new center of political and academic power
kingdom_prussia_1701.impact_on_science: Establishes Berlin as emerging center for mathematics and science, future home to Berlin Academy

war_spanish_succession_1701.headline: War of Spanish Succession begins
war_spanish_succession_1701.description: Continental European war involving most major powers over Spanish throne
war_spanish_succession_1701.impact_on_science: Disrupts communication and travel between European scientific centers

st_petersburg_founded_1703.headline: St. Petersburg founded by Peter the Great
st_petersburg_founded_1703.description: New Russian capital established, becomes center of scientific academy and mathematical excellence
st_petersburg_founded_1703.impact_on_science: Creates major new center for mathematics - future home to Euler and St. Petersburg Academy

act_union_1707.headline: Act of Union creates Kingdom of Great Britain
act_union_1707.description: Scottish and English Parliaments merge, establishing unified British academic and scientific institutions
act_union_1707.impact_on_science: Unifies British scientific institutions, strengthens Royal Society and university system

aurangzeb_death_1707.headline: Death of Mughal Emperor Aurangzeb
aurangzeb_death_1707.description: Fragmentation of Mughal Empire begins, affecting trade and scientific exchange with Europe
aurangzeb_death_1707.impact_on_science: Affects Indo-European mathematical and astronomical knowledge exchange

great_frost_1709.headline: Great Frost of 1709
great_frost_1709.description: Coldest winter in 500 years affects European politics and contributes to Swedish defeat
great_frost_1709.impact_on_science: Extreme weather affects travel and communication between European academies

statute_anne_1710.headline: World's first copyright legislation enacted
statute_anne_1710.description: Britain's Statute of Anne establishes intellectual property rights
statute_anne_1710.impact_on_science: Protects scientific and mathematical publications, encourages scholarly writing

treaty_nystad_1721.headline: Treaty of Nystad ends Great Northern War
treaty_nystad_1721.description: Russia emerges as major European power, consolidates control over Baltic region
treaty_nystad_1721.impact_on_science: Stabilizes Northern Europe, allows resumption of academic exchange and travel

peter_great_reforms_1723.headline: Peter the Great abolishes slavery in Russia
peter_great_reforms_1723.description: Major social reform converts household slaves to serfs
peter_great_reforms_1723.impact_on_science: Part of broader Russian modernization that includes founding of Academy of Sciences

catherine_i_death_1727.headline: Catherine I dies, Peter II becomes Tsar
catherine_i_death_1727.description: Political instability as 11-year-old becomes Russian ruler
catherine_i_death_1727.impact_on_science: Academy of Sciences seeks stability by recruiting foreign mathematicians like Euler

anglo_spanish_war_1727.headline: Anglo-Spanish War begins
anglo_spanish_war_1727.description: Maritime conflict between Britain and Spain over trade routes
anglo_spanish_war_1727.impact_on_science: Affects transatlantic scientific communication and specimen collection

first_great_awakening_1730.headline: First Great Awakening begins
first_great_awakening_1730.description: Religious revival movement in Britain and North America
first_great_awakening_1730.impact_on_science: Influences intellectual climate and relationship between science and religion

war_polish_succession_1733.headline: War of Polish Succession begins
war_polish_succession_1733.description: European powers fight over Polish throne succession
war_polish_succession_1733.impact_on_science: Disrupts Central European academic networks and universities

qianlong_emperor_1735.headline: Qianlong Emperor begins 60-year reign
qianlong_emperor_1735.description: High Qing era of cultural and territorial expansion begins
qianlong_emperor_1735.impact_on_science: Golden age of Chinese science and mathematics, Jesuit scientific exchange

nader_shah_delhi_1739.headline: Nader Shah sacks Delhi
nader_shah_delhi_1739.description: Persian invasion of Mughal India, massive wealth transfer
nader_shah_delhi_1739.impact_on_science: Disrupts Indo-Persian mathematical and astronomical traditions

war_jenkins_ear_1739.headline: War of Jenkins' Ear begins
war_jenkins_ear_1739.description: Britain and Spain fight in Caribbean over trade disputes
war_jenkins_ear_1739.impact_on_science: Affects colonial scientific expeditions and natural history collection

irish_famine_1740.headline: Great Irish Famine kills 20% of population
irish_famine_1740.description: Devastating famine affects Irish population and economy
irish_famine_1740.impact_on_science: Affects Trinity College Dublin and Irish intellectual life

war_austrian_succession_1740.headline: War of Austrian Succession begins
war_austrian_succession_1740.description: Major European conflict over Habsburg succession
war_austrian_succession_1740.impact_on_science: Disrupts German and Austrian universities, affects Habsburg patronage of sciences

first_saudi_state_1744.headline: First Saudi State founded
first_saudi_state_1744.description: Mohammed Ibn Saud establishes Wahhabi state in Arabian Peninsula
first_saudi_state_1744.impact_on_science: Affects Islamic mathematical and astronomical traditions in Arabia

jacobite_rising_1745.headline: Second Jacobite Rising begins
jacobite_rising_1745.description: Charles Edward Stuart leads Scottish revolt against British rule
jacobite_rising_1745.impact_on_science: Disrupts Scottish universities and intellectual life

treaty_aix_la_chapelle_1748.headline: Treaty of Aix-la-Chapelle ends War of Austrian Succession
treaty_aix_la_chapelle_1748.description: Peace treaty restores stability to Central Europe
treaty_aix_la_chapelle_1748.impact_on_science: Allows resumption of academic travel and correspondence across Europe

little_ice_age_peak_1750.headline: Peak of Little Ice Age
little_ice_age_peak_1750.description: Coldest period of Little Ice Age affects global climate
little_ice_age_peak_1750.impact_on_science: Stimulates interest in meteorology and climate observation

british_calendar_reform_1752.headline: Britain adopts Gregorian Calendar
british_calendar_reform_1752.description: British Empire switches calendars, skipping 11 days
british_calendar_reform_1752.impact_on_science: Standardizes dating system for British scientific observations and correspondence

french_indian_war_1754.headline: French and Indian War begins
french_indian_war_1754.description: North American theater of Seven Years' War begins
french_indian_war_1754.impact_on_science: Affects colonial scientific expeditions and natural history studies

lisbon_earthquake_1755.headline: Great Lisbon Earthquake
lisbon_earthquake_1755.description: Devastating earthquake destroys Lisbon, kills up to 100,000
lisbon_earthquake_1755.impact_on_science: Stimulates early seismology studies and Enlightenment philosophical debates

seven_years_war_1756.headline: Seven Years' War begins
seven_years_war_1756.description: Global conflict involving all European great powers
seven_years_war_1756.impact_on_science: Major disruption to European academic networks and scientific correspondence

british_conquest_bengal_1757.headline: British conquest of Bengal
british_conquest_bengal_1757.description: Battle of Plassey establishes British dominance in India
british_conquest_bengal_1757.impact_on_science: Begins systematic British collection of Indian mathematical and scientific knowledge

george_iii_coronation_1760.headline: George III becomes King of Britain
george_iii_coronation_1760.description: New monarch begins 60-year reign during scientific revolution
george_iii_coronation_1760.impact_on_science: Patron of Royal Society and supporter of scientific expeditions

panipat_battle_1761.headline: Battle of Panipat
panipat_battle_1761.description: Maratha Empire suffers major defeat, reshapes Indian politics
panipat_battle_1761.impact_on_science: Affects Indian mathematical traditions and astronomical schools

catherine_great_reign_1762.headline: Catherine the Great begins reign
catherine_great_reign_1762.description: Catherine II becomes Empress of Russia, rules until 1796
catherine_great_reign_1762.impact_on_science: Major patron of sciences, expands St. Petersburg Academy, recruits Euler back

treaty_paris_1763.headline: Treaty of Paris ends Seven Years' War
treaty_paris_1763.description: Peace treaty reshapes global colonial empires
treaty_paris_1763.impact_on_science: Restores peaceful academic exchange across Europe, enables scientific expeditions

stamp_act_1765.headline: Stamp Act imposed on American colonies
stamp_act_1765.description: British taxation leads to colonial resistance movement
stamp_act_1765.impact_on_science: Affects American colonial colleges and scientific societies

christian_vii_denmark_1766.headline: Christian VII becomes King of Denmark
christian_vii_denmark_1766.description: New Danish monarch begins reign amid enlightenment reforms
christian_vii_denmark_1766.impact_on_science: Supports Danish scientific institutions and Arctic expeditions

russo_turkish_war_1768.headline: Russo-Turkish War begins
russo_turkish_war_1768.description: Russia and Ottoman Empire clash over Black Sea control
russo_turkish_war_1768.impact_on_science: Affects Eastern European academic networks and travel routes

cook_new_zealand_1769.headline: James Cook explores New Zealand and Australia
cook_new_zealand_1769.description: First European mapping of New Zealand and Australian coast
cook_new_zealand_1769.impact_on_science: Major scientific expedition advancing navigation, botany, and cartography

bengal_famine_1769.headline: Bengal Famine kills one-third of population
bengal_famine_1769.description: Devastating famine under British East India Company rule
bengal_famine_1769.impact_on_science: Affects Indian mathematical and scientific communities

gustav_iii_coup_1772.headline: Gustav III stages coup in Sweden
gustav_iii_coup_1772.description: Swedish king becomes absolute monarch after bloodless coup
gustav_iii_coup_1772.impact_on_science: Affects Swedish Academy of Sciences and Linnean institutions

partition_poland_1772.headline: First Partition of Poland
partition_poland_1772.description: Austria, Prussia, and Russia divide Polish territory
partition_poland_1772.impact_on_science: Disrupts Polish universities and forces migration of scholars

pugachev_rebellion_1773.headline: Pugachev's Rebellion begins
pugachev_rebellion_1773.description: Largest peasant revolt in Russian history
pugachev_rebellion_1773.impact_on_science: Threatens stability of Russian Empire and Academy of Sciences

american_revolution_1775.headline: American Revolutionary War begins
american_revolution_1775.description: Thirteen Colonies rebel against British rule
american_revolution_1775.impact_on_science: Involves scientist-politicians like Franklin, affects transatlantic scientific exchange

declaration_independence_1776.headline: United States Declaration of Independence
declaration_independence_1776.description: American colonies declare independence from Britain
declaration_independence_1776.impact_on_science: Creates new nation with emphasis on scientific progress and education

wealth_nations_1776.headline: Adam Smith publishes The Wealth of Nations
wealth_nations_1776.description: Foundational work of modern economics published
wealth_nations_1776.impact_on_science: Establishes political economy as scientific discipline

franco_american_alliance_1778.headline: Franco-American Alliance signed
franco_american_alliance_1778.description: France enters American Revolutionary War against Britain
franco_american_alliance_1778.impact_on_science: Facilitates French-American scientific cooperation, Franklin's diplomatic role
